description: Withdrawn by Agent - Erection of side extension to the southern flank wall of 39 Phillimore Gardens at upper ground floor level to house plant along with the provision of a condenser unit housed within acoustic enclosure within the previously approved front, southern lightwell at basement level. Works also include those previously consented for the construction of a basement with front light wells and roof lights to the rear: erection of rear lower ground floor extension and rear upper ground floor conservatory; provision of new landscaping; alterations to front portico and lower ground floor window openings; inner butterfly roof replaced with concealed roof terrace at main roof level; insertion of slim line conservation roof lights to rear main roof; all remaining timber sash and casement windows to be replaced like for like with timber slim line double glazed units; timber air extract acoustic louvre enclosures on flat roofs to north and south side extensions replacing existing exposed extract ducts; and the removal of the front bow window and replacement with a new bow window
